remarks: A module with a basis is isomorphic to a free module with the same cardinality.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 26-Feb-2015.)
statement:
lbslcic.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lbslcic.j $e |- J = ( LBasis ` W ) $.
lbslcic $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ B e. J /\ I ~~ B ) -> W ~=m ( F freeLMod I ) ) $.
